name: My Lovely Wife
description:
I, Jake, the one who fall for you since the day we met.
Take you, Luna, the one who accepted my love.
To be the one to love and to cherish.
To be the one and only, my lovely wife.
I will always love you and be by your side forever.
Till death do us part.
Will you do anything for the love of your life, even after they are gone?
From the creators of My Lovely Daughter, comes a twisted tale of undying love.
It all started with a letter. A letter with a familiar handwriting and a signature none other than hers. “Luna”, a name that brings lots of happy memories, but followed with a tragic one. In the letter, she asked you to perform otherworldly rituals to bring her back to life!
Play as Jake, a loving husband who is granted the power to summon dozens of succubus by a mysterious demon. Work with those succubi, make them fall in love with you… and sacrifice them to be used as the vessel for your wife’s soul.
What price will you pay to reunite with your lovely wife?
Key features:
A mix of dating, management and alchemy simulation in one game.
Multiple endings that give the game a high replay value.
Gothic fantasy art style fitting with the dark theme of My Lovely Wife.
An eerie soundtrack that sends shivers down your spine.
An uncanny love dilemma.
